name: The Reincarnation
description:
A boy lost his dog after an unfortunate tragedy. Unwilling to accept the dog's death, the boy must find a way to return his dog back.

Controls;

- WASD: For movement controls

- Q: Respawn to the last savepoint

- Left shift: Run

- Left shift + E: Dash

- LMB: Throw fireball

Installation Guide:

Use Winrar or other programs to extract .rar files.
